review: Works great. No issues. Installed in 5 minutes. Works great even with small internet package.
author: Amazon Customer

review: We've really enjoyed this Roku. I considered getting one of the box tops but I am glad I didn't. This works very well and plugs right into the HDMI port of my tuner, plugs into a power source and uses our wifi to receive the signal. It's compact and does the job. The remote works very well and we enjoy watching on demand programs this way.
